quote: Sonny and another Hells Angel who was at the meeting thought they were beyond a little patch so they headed down to a local tattoo shop in Oakland and were the first to get the famous One Percent tattoos.

I think I have enough tattoos for now. If I get any others, I'll probably do my kids initials.

I'm a very traditional person. The tattoos are about my grandmother dying and they tell the story about my mother and father, my brothers and my sister, my kids. It's pretty much a family tree on my arm with my life in football too.
Well, I love tattoos and have been drawing them on my binders in school since I was little.

I love seeing tattoos on 60-year-olds who have had them for 40 years.
